### 3.3

![image-20221114023235156](笔记.assets/image-20221114023235156.png)

![image-20221114023301096](笔记.assets/image-20221114023301096.png)

入口层

![image-20221114020453773](笔记.assets/image-20221114020453773.png)

应用层

![image-20221114020525184](笔记.assets/image-20221114020525184.png)

页面层

![image-20221114020745413](笔记.assets/image-20221114020745413.png)

组件层

![image-20221114020914611](笔记.assets/image-20221114020914611.png)

（入口层，main.dart）》MaterialApp（应用层，application.dart）》Container（页面层，pages/home/index.dart）》Scaffold（组件层，widgets/page_content.dart）
